availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Walker (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Charles H. Walker and Mary Bloyd Walker. Married to Celina Jane Mears Walker in Green County, Kentucky, on September 20, 1860. Father of Mary E. Walker and Martha E. Walker. Attended school in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 139A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 654.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 2, p. 445B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 63-28632.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000594378.
"George Washington Walker (1838-1926)," Find A Grave, Memorial 92737293, accessed March 3, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92737293.
